main event: A UFO was observed at Mitchel AFB, N.Y. on 6 Feb 59 for approximately 30 minutes.
interesting points: The object was reported as a steady light too high to be a marker and too steady for a weather balloon or airplane,It was moving slowly from west to north in a circular motion,The observer used a theodolite to measure azimuth and elevation angles,The time duration of observation exceeded typical conditions for aircraft or balloon under the wind conditions,The event was documented in a Project Blue Book record.
